ComicInfo.Title: Forced Eviction
ComicInfo.Series: Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland Graphic Novel
ComicInfo.Summary: The zombies have overrun the compound and Remy and Max are separated! Desperate to find him, Remy sets out with Harlow and Sommer -- but only two can survive! Meanwhile Blue and Lazlo find themselves trapped in a car surrounded by zombies, and a lion not yet called Ripley is saved from certain death as we continue through this enhanced adaptation of Amanda Hocking's best selling novel HOLLOWLAND by #1 New York Times bestseller Tony Lee, with amazing artwork by Steve Uy (Avengers Initiative, JSA Classified)! Dynamite Entertainment proudly presents Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland graphic novel.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 14:49:30. [CVDB413994]
